text:
I agree that the strategy is hard to describe. Instead of describing it, I think that you should at least state what is the purpose of the "auto" keyword:

The default strategy, corresponding to "auto", computes a threshold that seeks to minimize (yet not eliminate completely) the overlap between maps for a better display.
title: (None, '', u'nilearn/plotting/img_plotting.py')

text:
It is a bit convoluted. I would simplify:

If None, no threshold is applied.

Even better:

If None, a very small threshold is applied to remove numerical noise from the maps background.
title: (None, '', u'nilearn/plotting/img_plotting.py')

text:
